reviewText: All expecting parents should watch this video!

This is a must for any childbirth education facility!!!

Recommended by: The Mothering Touch Centre Victoria, BC Canada

as a parent educator and lactation consultant it is brilliant as this is the hour for babies to initiate their feeds , it reduces their stress, helps their immunity and so much more & parents need to know this & challenge practices that seperate mums and babes at birth even if only to weigh them
The silverware container was missing from the dish drainer.
Every expecting couple needs to see this!  Its beautifully done and filled with wonderful info from the parent 's perspective

The Magical Hour is an enthralling account of the importance of skin to skin in the first hour of life. It's an awe inspiring experience and it bought me such joy. What a beautiful and miraculous welcome to the world. I recommend this video to everyone but especially to every mother and father. I wish I had this knowlege when I gave birth to my own children.
